name: Tales of Erya: Deeproot Dungeon
description:
Deeproot Dungeon - or The Ancient Temple , how some of the few locals call it - is possesed by an entity of unkown origin. One thing's for sure: someone has to free the dungeon from its tormentor. But beware, there is someone who wants to keep the heroes from uncovering the secrets of this ancient temple...

In this asynchron dungeon crawler, you can choose sides. Will you team-up with other heroes to free the dungeon from its tormentor, or do you prefere to play as the dungeon master to stop them? Play it local or via web with your friends!

The first entry of the Tales of Erya - Saga is the successor of Endless Greed, the winner of 2020s SAE Award winner for Best Games Programming.

Art | Clara Ruthner , Lilli Sagaischek, Max Gruessinger

Programming | Kevin Hell, Peter Redinger
